snippet: PAJEWSKI--Stan Page, born Stanley Pajewski, died peacefully on June 5. He was a singer and actor. Stan and his late wife, dancer Mickey Gunnersen, between them appeared in over two dozen broadway shows and many regional, summer stock, road companies and on television. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PAJEWSKI--Stan Page, born Stanley Pajewski, died peacefully on June 5. He was a singer and actor. Stan and his late wife, dancer Mickey Gunnersen, between them appeared in over two dozen broadway shows and many regional, summer stock, road companies and on television. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PAJEWSKI, STAN PAGE
